description: Demand-validated automation tools platform with Meta Lead Ads, Remotion ad creation, Ads Autopilot, and competitive intelligence

phases.phase1_lead_capture: Meta Lead Ads + Lead Form + Scoring
phases.phase4_ads_autopilot: Meta Marketing API + AI decision engine

features.name: Meta Leadgen Webhook
features.description: Receive and process Meta lead ad submissions via webhook

features.name: Lead Data Fetch (Graph API)
features.description: Fetch full lead details from Meta Graph API after webhook

features.name: Lead Storage (Supabase)
features.description: Store leads in Supabase with platform, package, goal, timeline, budget fields

features.name: Lead Scoring Algorithm
features.description: Calculate lead score based on timeline, budget, volume, and engagement

features.name: Lead Segmentation
features.description: Segment leads by platform, package, urgency, and budget tier

features.name: Meta Instant Form Builder
features.description: Configure and manage Meta Instant Forms with custom questions

features.name: Thank You Screen Config
features.description: Customize post-submission screen with CTA and follow link

features.name: Resend Integration
features.description: Connect Resend for transactional email delivery

features.name: Welcome Email (Immediate)
features.description: Send welcome email within 1-5 minutes of signup

features.name: Sample Output Email
features.description: Send screenshot/preview of what user will get

features.name: Roadmap + Vote Email
features.description: Ask user to vote on which feature ships first

features.name: Beta Invite Email
features.description: Invite high-intent leads to beta test program

features.name: Pricing Lock-in Email
features.description: Offer early-bird pricing lock for Phase B leads

features.name: Product Delivery Email
features.description: Auto-deliver product access when ready (15-60 min promise)

features.name: Resend Webhook Handler
features.description: Track email opens, clicks, bounces via Resend webhooks

features.name: Remotion Ads Service
features.description: Express server on port 8686 for rendering video/static ads

features.name: Video Ad Template (15-25s)
features.description: Pattern break + outcome + proof hint + CTA video template

features.name: Static Ad Template
features.description: Headline + subtext + screenshot + CTA static image template

features.name: Creative CRUD API
features.description: /api/ads/creatives endpoints for create, read, update, delete

features.name: Human Approval Queue
features.description: Review queue for approving/rejecting creatives before publish

features.name: Creative Duplication
features.description: Clone existing ad creative with modifications

features.name: Batch Render API
features.description: Generate multiple ad creatives in one request

features.name: Approval Audit Trail
features.description: Log all approval actions with timestamp and reviewer

features.name: AI Copywriting Integration
features.description: Generate ad copy variations using GPT-4

features.name: Sora Video Integration
features.description: Generate video clips using Sora API for ad creatives

features.name: Meta Marketing API Client
features.description: Client for Meta Marketing API (campaigns, adsets, ads)

features.name: Campaign Creation API
features.description: Create campaigns with objectives, budget, schedule

features.name: Ad Set Creation API
features.description: Create ad sets with targeting, placements, optimization

features.name: Ad Creative Upload
features.description: Upload rendered assets to Ad Account for use in ads

features.name: Ad Creation API
features.description: Create ads linking creative to ad set

features.name: Performance Metrics Fetch
features.description: Pull CPC, CPL, CVR, CTR, ROAS from Meta Insights API

features.name: Rules Engine (Pause/Scale)
features.description: Auto pause losers and scale winners based on rules

features.name: AI Decision Engine
features.description: GPT-4 analysis of performance with recommendations

features.name: Budget Allocation Optimizer
features.description: Automatically reallocate budget to winners

features.name: Creative Iteration Generator
features.description: Generate next CreativeSpecs based on winning patterns

features.name: Dynamic Creative Testing
features.description: Support Meta Dynamic Creative Optimization

features.name: A/B Split Testing
features.description: Structured split tests with statistical significance

features.name: Meta Ad Library Scraper
features.description: Search and collect ads from Meta Ad Library

features.name: TikTok Commercial Center Scraper
features.description: Collect ads from TikTok Commercial Center

features.name: Winner Detection Algorithm
features.description: Identify ads running 30+ days as winners

features.name: Competitor Tracker
features.description: Monitor specific brands' ad activity over time

features.name: Change Detection
features.description: Detect new campaigns, stopped ads, strategy shifts

features.name: Trend Detection Engine
features.description: Identify emerging niches from ad spend patterns

features.name: UX Teardown Analyzer
features.description: Analyze competitor landing pages for patterns

features.name: AI Strategy Briefs
features.description: Generate recommendations from competitor analysis

features.name: Ad Creative Database
features.description: Store and search 68M+ collected ad creatives

features.name: Winning Pattern Extraction
features.description: Extract messaging angles, hooks, formats from winners

features.name: Landing Page Template System
features.description: Standardized micro-startup page template

features.name: Headline Generator
features.description: Generate headlines using outcome + time + pain removal formulas

features.name: Core Promise Bullets
features.description: 3 benefit → mechanism → proof hint bullets

features.name: Proof Demo Section
features.description: Sample output preview, Loom, or Figma embed

features.name: Waitlist CTA with Intent Question
features.description: Email + qualifying question + micro-commitment checkbox

features.name: Progress Tracker Display
features.description: Visual milestone tracker with dates

features.name: Pricing Anchor Section
features.description: Soft pricing (Phase A) or real pricing (Phase B)

features.name: You're In Page
features.description: Post-signup page with poll, beta apply, pricing lock

features.name: DM Follow-up Assistant
features.description: Auto-DM sequences, inbox triage, reply drafting for IG/TikTok/X/Threads

features.name: Auto-Comment Assistant
features.description: AI-powered contextual comments with scheduling

features.name: Inbox Triage + Reply Drafting
features.description: Priority sorting, template responses, AI suggestions

features.name: Lead Tracker + Follow-up Sequences
features.description: Lead scoring, automated nurture, CRM sync

features.name: Custom Dashboard Delivery
features.description: Primary product delivery via custom dashboard

features.description: Product delivery via Skool community access

features.description: Product delivery via Whop storefront

features.description: Track page views, signups, conversions with Meta Pixel

features.name: Conversions API (CAPI)
features.description: Server-side event tracking for attribution accuracy

features.name: PostHog Integration
features.description: Product analytics for user behavior tracking

features.name: UTM Tracking System
features.description: utm_campaign, utm_content, utm_term for attribution

features.name: Event Tracking (Core Events)
features.description: page_view, waitlist_submit, poll_vote, pricing_click, beta_apply

features.name: FBP/FBC Cookie Capture
features.description: Store _fbp, _fbc, fbclid for attribution

features.name: End-to-End Attribution
features.description: Trace creative → ad → lead → purchase chain

features.name: Funnel Metrics Dashboard
features.description: CPC, LPV Rate, CVR, CPL, High-Intent Rate visualization

features.name: Results Sheet Export
features.description: Export idea, spend, clicks, LPVs, signups, CPL, notes

features.name: Two-Pass Winner System
features.description: Threshold check + weighted score for idea ranking

features.name: Minimum Thresholds Check
features.description: Auto-disqualify ideas below signup/intent/CPL thresholds

features.name: Weighted Score Calculator
features.description: CPL (40%) + CVR (30%) + Intent (20%) + Qualitative (10%)

features.name: Implied CAC Calculator
features.description: Calculate implied CAC from CPL and conversion assumptions

features.name: Intent Ladder Tracking
features.description: Track Level 1-4 (Click → Signup → Intent → Commit)

features.name: Phase A: Broad Demand Scan
features.description: Rank top 2-3 from 5-10 ideas with soft pricing

features.name: Phase B: Intent Verification
features.description: Real pricing, beta apps, deposits for top ideas

features.name: Phase C: Build Winner
features.description: Build only validated winner with warm list

features.name: Replace Dashboard TODO with Real Facebook API Data
features.description: Replace TODO stub in waitlist-lab/src/app/dashboard/page-old.tsx that says 'Fetch real data from Facebook API' with actual Meta Marketing API calls or remove the old dashboard page entirely
acceptance: Dashboard data fetched from real Facebook API or page removed
No TODO.*Fetch real data stubs remain

features.name: Implement Real Twitter/X API v2 Platform Manager
features.description: Replace 2 TODO stubs in waitlist-lab/src/lib/amd/platform-manager.ts with real Twitter API v2 posting and metrics fetching implementations
acceptance: Twitter posting uses real API v2
Twitter metrics fetching uses real API v2
No TODO.*Implement Twitter stubs remain in platform-manager.ts
